Events.EventHeader: Special Olympics, Make Cheer Signs From Home
Events.EventBlurb: Bring energy and excitement for the athletes by making cheer signs that volunteers will use to encourage the athletes during their competitions throughout the state. Have your team, family, or yourself be a part of the celebration by hosting a cheer sign making event! One person typically makes 1-2 signs in 30mins. This is a great opportunity for creative expression and casual group or individual engagement
